scripts.test: grunt test --stack && npm run build && npm run build:min && grunt template:test
scripts.merge:debug: git merge debug --no-commit --no-ff && grunt string-replace:console test
scripts.build: modernizr --config modernizr-config.json --dest dist/modernizr-hbbtv.js && cat feature-detects/hbbtv.js feature-detects/hbbtv/video.js >> dist/modernizr-hbbtv.js
scripts.build:min: modernizr --config modernizr-config.json --uglify --dest dist/modernizr-hbbtv.min.js && cat feature-detects/hbbtv.js feature-detects/hbbtv/video.js >> dist/modernizr-hbbtv.min.js
scripts.patch-release: npm test && npm version patch && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
